response.overview: Following the project's reveal at last year's Anime Expo, the CloverWorks industry panel today revealed with a new teaser video that Atsushi Nishigori's (DARLING in the FRANXX) "GROTESQUE" anime film is officially titled GROTESQQQUE and will be released in Japanese theaters in 2026. The film will consist of three parts with three different worldviews, each titled "ÆLIENS", "4649GIRL" and "NOCTURN: ‌EN ‌CETTE ‌NUIT ‌GROTESQUE".
response.title: GROTESQQQUE: ÆLIENS
